name: Indiana Jeans and the legacy of the Pleiadians
name_original: Indiana Jeans and the legacy of the Pleiadians
description: The real life people who appears here are here in a way that was completely imagined by me, I don't support the idea they are part of the Illuminati in any way as they are sometimes considered, by me at least, as heroes of the family values in the 80s. A time when Hollywood was at the brink of going full-porn. It's in Spanish, but translatable via Google Translate.
